# HMCharacteristicValueTamperedStatus

**Enumeration**

Possible values for the tampering status of an accessory.

## Declaration

```swift
enum HMCharacteristicValueTamperedStatus
```

## Tampered Status

- **HMCharacteristicValueTamperedStatus.none**: The accessory has not been tampered with.
- **HMCharacteristicValueTamperedStatus.tampered**: The accessory has been tampered with.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype

items.description: The accessory has not been tampered with.
items.name: HMCharacteristicValueTamperedStatus.none

items.description: The accessory has been tampered with.
